resources.string: Do you want to clean it?

Running too many apps in the background at the same time might cause your phone overheated. High phone temperature affects the performance of the phone, making it slow, freeze. Cooling App detects apps with high CPU usage so you can close them by one click and make your phone cool.

Due to poor design, some apps might constantly use your CPU in background, which causes the phone to overheat. Using complex apps, playing games, watching videos for a long time might cause your phone overheat, while charging battery cause a lot of heat, so its nothing unusual for the phone slightly heat up.

High Phone temperature affects the performance of the phone and make it slow, hanged or restart. A phone that is running at high temperature for too long cause the electronic components inside to wear out decrease the phone\'s service life.
